title: How do I add friends since Avicus page?

replies.body:
I think this sounds hard as google translator O.O
But if u mean how to get friends, as I think you do, you have to go onto the website www.old.avicus.net/ <the name of your friend> then click the button Add Friend

then your friend has to go onto www.old.avicus.net/ <your name> and klick on Accept Friendship
replies.body_tagged:
I think this sounds hard as google translator O.O
But if u mean how to get friends, as I think you do, you have to go onto the website www.old.avicus.net/ <the name of your friend> then click the button Add Friend

then your friend has to go onto www.old.avicus.net/ <your name> and klick on Accept Friendship
